fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are a player controlled by AI, the host will feed an AI of its choice a description of what happened in day chat.
- The Extra Player will recieve a random role that can't kill or use a purely negative effect at the start of each night, AI will choose what do to based on the day chat info and role.
- Cannot be lynched or killed, but can be modkilled if [Alive players - Day #] people vote to ban it.
- Their thought process and action will be announced at the day, no specific time, just like a real player.
- Can be forcespawned.
